data.actual_result: The Audit Log displays both changes as *changing* the topic.
data.expected_result: The Audit Log displays the first change as *setting* the topic and the second change as *changing* the topic.
data.short_description: Topic set incorrectly labelled as topic change in Audit Log under certain circumstances.
data.steps_to_repro: - Set and save the topic of a channel that has never had a topic. - Immediately change and save the topic.
